title: Guest House
description: College student, Taryn Moore, planned to spend spring break with her friends. But everything changes when she learns a grant has fallen through, forcing her to spend every penny she saved from her part-time job to pay the tuition balance.All her plans were ruined until she runs--literally--into her gorgeous professor. During a dinner in his home with his equally beautiful wife, Taryn's elated when they offer their guest house to her for free.It doesn't take long, however, for Taryn to realize that the sexy couple has other plans for her--things most virgins never even fantasize. Yet, what surprises her the most is the instant sexual attraction she feels toward the couple. And how much she yearns to be invited into their bed.Author's Note: This book is over-the-top, insta-lust filled with tons of steamy F/F/M, M/F, and F/F scenes. If you're looking for hot and dirty, this is it!
author: Sasha Jayne Moretti
